text: wadhkuruu niematana ealaykum hin qalna: adkhuluu madina "byat almuqdasa" fakuluu min tayibatiha fi 'ayi makan minha 'aklana hnyyana, wakunuu fi dukhulikum khadiein lilha, dhulilayn laha, waquluu: rbbana dae enna dhunubana, nastajib lakum wanaef wanastarha ealaykum, wasanazid almuhsinin bi'aemalihim khyrana wthwabana
